package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Super Rude Bear Resurrection - Soundtrack

short_description: 73 bad boy Grime tunes by Deeco, the Super Rude Bear Resurrection soundtrack.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
